metas.description: All the betting and form for the 2015 Supreme Novices Hurdle at the Cheltenham Festival, including Briar Hill who is the horse to watch this season.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival 2015 Day 1 - Supreme Novices Hurdle

The first race of the 2015 Cheltenham Festival is the Supreme Novices Hurdle, the start of the race is greeted with a huge roar from the Cheltenham stands as we see the young hurdlers take their chance. There is always a huge build up to the Supreme Novices as we get to see the superstars of the future take their first steps in the big time, we had a fantastic winner in Champagne Fever last year who stormed up the hill to claim a memorable win for Willie Mullins.

We have two fancied horses for the race today with Douvan and L'Ami Serge both coming into the race in great form for Willie Mullins and Nicky Henderson.

Supreme Novices Hurdle Result 2015

13:30 Sky Bet Supreme Novices' Hurdle (Grade 1)
1.Douvan - W Mullins - R Walsh - 2/1f
2.Shaneshill - W Mullins - P Townend - 9/1
3.Sizing John - H De Bromhead - J Burke - 25/1
12 Ran

2.Josses Hill - A Tinkler - N Henderson - 14/1
3.Vaniteux - B Geraghty - N Henderson - 11/1
4.Sgt Reckless - D Elsworth - M Channon - 33/1
18 Runners
